scripts.build:physics: cd physics && RUSTFLAGS='-C target-feature=+atomics,+bulk-memory,+mutable-globals,+simd128 -C link-arg=--shared-memory -C link-arg=--max-memory=2147483648 -C link-arg=--export=__wasm_init_memory_flag -C link-arg=--import-memory -C link-arg=--export=__wasm_init_tls -C link-arg=--export=__tls_size -C link-arg=--export=__tls_align -C link-arg=--export=__tls_base' rustup run nightly wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir ../src/infrastructure/physics/wasm -- --features parallel -Z build-std=std,panic_abort && cd ..
